question.text:
Read the following statements about evolution:

A. Homology is based on convergent evolution whereas analogy refers to a situation exactly opposite.
B. Industrial melanism in England is one of the best examples of comparative anatomy.
C. Disturbance in genetic equilibrium in a population indicates the evolution have occurred.

options.text: A, B and C are true
A, B and C are false
B and C are true; A is false
A and B are false; C is true

solution.text: Homology is based on divergent evolution whereas analogy refers to a situation exactly opposite. Industrial melanism in England is one of the best example of directional or progressive natural selection.
